text: "Please" is a song recorded by American country music artist Pam Tillis. It was released in December 2000 as the first single from the album Thunder & Roses. The song reached #22 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Jeffrey Steele, Michael Dulaney and John Hobbs. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2000-2001) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2001 singles Category:2000 songs Category:Pam Tillis songs Category:Songs written by Michael Dulaney Category:Songs written by Jeffrey Steele Category:Song recordings produced by Billy Joe Walker Jr. Category:Arista Nashville singles
